content:
Here's an example of a properly formatted and effectual Letter of Intent (LOI) to Apply for INSPIRE Funding via the partnership with the Ohio Governor’s Office of Appalachia:

[Your organization's letterhead or name and address]

[Date]

[Name and address of the contact person at the Ohio Governor’s Office of Appalachia]

Dear [Contact Person’s Name]:

I am writing to express our interest in applying for INSPIRE funding through the Ohio Governor’s Office of Appalachia. We believe that our proposed project aligns well with the goals of the INSPIRE initiative and has the potential to make a positive impact on STEM education and workforce development in the Appalachian region.

[In the first paragraph, introduce your organization and briefly summarize your proposed project. This should include the project's title, goals, objectives, and anticipated outcomes.]

[In the second paragraph, describe how your proposed project aligns with the goals of the INSPIRE initiative and how it will contribute to STEM education and workforce development in the Appalachian region. Be specific and provide evidence or data where possible.]

[In the third paragraph, provide a brief overview of your organization's experience and qualifications for carrying out the proposed project. This may include relevant past projects, expertise, or partnerships that will be leveraged for the proposed project.]

[In the fourth paragraph, conclude by expressing your appreciation for the opportunity to submit an LOI and your willingness to work with the Ohio Governor’s Office of Appalachia to further refine the project proposal as needed. Include your contact information, including name, email address, and phone number, so that the Ohio Governor’s Office of Appalachia can follow up with you.]

Thank you for your consideration of our proposed project. We look forward to the opportunity to apply for INSPIRE funding and to make a meaningful contribution to STEM education and workforce development in the Appalachian region.

Sincerely,

[Your name and title]

[Your organization's name]
